name: Ultimate Ragdoll Game
description:
Ultimate Ragdoll Game is a sandbox game with no limits. We give you various blocks, game modes and full freedom of gameplay. The game doesn't have any specific way of playing or ending. Your main goal is to have fun! Use Steam Workshop to add new characters to the game, explore community-created maps, and when you're done, use the photo mode to share your work with the community.

KEY FEATURES



NO LIMITS
The game has literally no limits. No ragdoll limit. No blocks limit. No building hight limit. No players limit. No speed limit. No time limit. No fun limit. Got it?

The only limit is your 🌈 𝓘𝓶𝓪𝓰𝓲𝓷𝓪𝓽𝓲𝓸𝓷 🌈 (and your PC).

FULL CUSTOMIZATION
You can modify blocks and ragdolls in any way you want. Adjust scale, color, gravity, physics, player's speed, time of the day and MANY MANY MORE! Every block has its own unique properties. The possibilities are infinite.

MULTIPLE MODES
The game contains 5 basic modes:

  • PLAY MODE
  • EDIT MODE
  • SPAWN RAGDOLL
  • BUILD MODE
  • PHOTO MODE

Each of these modes is divided into many sub-modes that will provide you with hours of creative fun.

YOUR OWN RAGDOLLS



CREATE YOUR OWN RAGDOLLS
Unlike many other ragdoll-focused games, in Ultimate Ragdoll Game you have the ability of adding your own characters to the game. Create infinite number of your own ragdolls and play with the ones you want.

EASY TO DO
Are you afraid you can't handle it? Don't worry! Thanks to provided SDK and video tutorial the process of adding your own characters to the game is very simple. All instructions can be found in the tutorial section of the community forum.

STEAM WORKSHOP
Don't feel like creating your own characters? Don't have the time? Maybe you are too lazy? Nevermind! The Ultimate Ragdoll Game supports Steam Workshop, which means you can always add community-created characters to the game. All with the click of a button!
